sentences.en: Every dish was served heavily spiced.
sentences.cn: 端上来的每道菜都加了很多佐料。
这蛋糕中加香料了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He did have too much spiced curry chicken earlier that evening.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上早些时候他的确是吃了太多香辣咖喱鸡了.

sentences.en: He spiced the biscuits with cinnamon.
His stories are spiced with humour.
sentences.cn: 他的小说里有很多幽默风趣的片段.

sentences.en: His talk was spiced with vivid examples.
sentences.cn: 他在报告中穿插了一些生动的例子.

sentences.en: In Beijing, the best - known spiced beef is made in Yue Sheng Zhai.
sentences.cn: 月盛斋的酱牛肉在北京, 最有名的牛肉制作工艺就是月盛斋.

sentences.en: Products Cooked pig's tongue, roasted chicken's wing , roasted sausage, spiced beef, etc.
sentences.cn: 主要产品:卤口条 、 鸡翅、香肉 、 肠 、 园腿 、 烧、鸡、香牛肉.

sentences.en: The hot apple cider is usually spiced up with cinnamon and nutmeg.
sentences.cn: 热苹果酒则通常加入肉桂和豆蔻调味.

sentences.en: The soup was heavily peppered and spiced.
sentences.cn: 汤里加了许多胡椒粉和香料.

sentences.en: Their presence spiced the dinner party up.
sentences.cn: 他们的到来使宴会活跃起来.

sentences.en: They ate little biscuits made with flour and honey, spiced with cinnamon.
sentences.cn: 他们吃那种由面粉和蜂蜜, 加上含桂皮的香料制成的小饼干.

sentences.en: They spiced their conversations and discussions with intrigue.
sentences.cn: 他们的谈话和讨论透着些许的神秘。

sentences.en: This dish has been spiced up.
What kind will you have? Bolony? Salami ? Spiced ham? Liverwurst? Head cheese?
sentences.cn: 您要什么样儿的? 意大利熏肠 呢? 意大利咸腊肠呢? 香火腿呢?肝末腊肠 呢 ?还是猪头肉膏 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 五香的；调过味的；含香料的

phrases.tran_cn: 香料群岛（等于Moluccas，印度尼西亚东北部马鲁古群岛）
生活的调味品；使人高兴的事

trans.tran_cn: 含香料的，五香的，调过味的
trans.tran_en: Food that is spiced has had spices or other strong-tasting foods added to it
